cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_X2U to 0, which is below the valid port range (1-65535), will cause X2-U interface binding failure and prevent user plane connectivity.
cu.explanation_zh: 將 GNB_PORT_FOR_X2U 設定為 0，低於有效端口範圍 (1-65535)，會導致 X2-U 接口綁定失敗，並阻止用戶平面連接。

du.explanation_en: Setting T1a_cp_ul to identical values will cause timing inconsistency in the front-haul configuration and prevent proper synchronization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 T1a_cp_ul 設定為相同的值會導致前傳配置中的時序不一致，並阻止正確的同步。
